name: Chest Building Sim
description:
Chest Building Sim is the most realistic simulator out there when it comes to chest building simulators!

after many many years* of research and development, we are finally proud to announce and release Chest Building Sim!

Features:

Fast-Paced Immersive gameplay!

Next-gen highly realistic graphics!

Advanced steroid simulation!

and many more!**

*Source: Trust me dude

**This statement might not be true.

Created during the last 17 hours of Code It Out Game Jam 2022

My high score is 470(no steroids!) lets see if you can beat it!
